desc: Our General Store is a historic shopping destination located in the heart of the California Redwoods on Main Street in Ferndale CA. Offering local goods, vintage candy, pantry provisions, kids toys, kitchen essentials and home goods!

layout.text: The Golden Gait Mercantile awaits your visit.
With two floors to lose track of time, existence, the Golden Gait Mercantile isn’t just a store—it’s an experience, where many people come in as customers, and leave as friends.
